title: Fighter Item that offers a windowed countermeasure against perma-slows and chain-CC.
body:
Theme: Armor of something tanky that can turn angry, possibly Sea Creature or Mountain Creature; Leviathan, Dragon, Lava Monster, Alistar, Pantheon, Gromp, etc.
Cost: Medium, 2600 -- 3000 Gold
- Moderate Health
- Low Attack Damage
UNIQUE Passive: Blocks a flat amount of damage from enemy champions (similar to Guardian's Horn).
UNIQUE Passive: Builds 30 charges per second while your movement is impaired, half amount plus half amount times slow strength for slows. At 100, consumes all charges to remove all crowd control debuffs and grant Slow Immunity or very high Slow Resistance for a few seconds. Charges decay slowly while you can move unimpaired and rapidly when out of combat. 90 second cooldown.

Chain CC will always exist and perma-slows will always pop up every once in a while even if Riot tries to squash them. A great option to help players deal with them while they figure things out is to give us counterbuy options. This version is intended for Fighters as they struggle the most against these issues. Tanks and Marksmen with Supports will just survive, Assassins will avoid it with their mobility, and Mages and bad Marksmen that get caught will die like they're supposed to. Meanwhile, Fighters can't do their jobs.

The small block passive is to solidate the item as a defensive buy and it retains more of its value the less Resistances you have, so it's good on a class that stacks a lot of Health.

So they next time Gnar kites you into the grave, or Morgana and Sejuani chain you for 3 years, you can buy this item and have a window to turn things around.
